name: GD AutoBot
description: Auto player bot with beam-search planner, solid collision, debug draw, and settings UI

sim-frames.name: Planning Horizon (frames)
sim-frames.description: How far ahead the planner simulates (higher = smarter but slower)

step-frames.name: Planner Step (frames)
step-frames.description: How many physics frames each planner action is held constant

beam-width.name: Beam Width
beam-width.description: How many candidate futures the planner keeps (higher = smarter but slower)

time-budget-ms.name: Planner Time Budget (ms)
time-budget-ms.description: Max CPU time per replan (keeps game from lagging)

replan-every.name: Replan Every (frames)
replan-every.description: How often to rebuild the plan (lower = more reactive, higher = faster)

hold-duration.name: Tap Length (frames)
hold-duration.description: How long a tap action holds before releasing (useful for UFO/Ball)

hitbox-scale.name: Player Hitbox Scale
hitbox-scale.description: Smaller = tighter/more accurate, larger = more cautious

safe-margin.name: Safe Margin (px)
safe-margin.description: Extra padding around the player hitbox

near-scan-range.name: Near Scan Range (px)
near-scan-range.description: How far to scan objects for safety scoring / collision

debug-draw.name: Debug Draw
debug-draw.description: Draw hazard/solid boxes and predicted paths (world-space)
